name: CMS Bureau Francis Lefebvre
goal:
CMS Bureau Francis Lefebvre is one of the leading law firms in France, whose deep roots, unique positioning and highly recognised expertise enables it to deliver innovative, high-value added solutions in Tax, Corporate and Employment law.

As a top 13 global law firm, CMS, the organisation to which CMS Bureau Francis Lefebvre belongs, is highly qualified to assist you with your projects through its 71 offices in 40 countries worldwide. With 4,500 lawyers, CMS member firms provide you with advice that is tailored to your local and international needs.
euInitiatives: Our collaboration with the European Commission consists in experience and outlook exchanges (not against remuneration) in the context of Think Tanks put in place by the Commission in the context of taxation subjects, especially through experts groups : transfer pricing and VAT. See details about our participation in the experts' groups sections.
